item.description:
Last Call for tickets. Please update your RSVPs.    

Boston Uncorked is turning SEVEN this year and is throwing a party to celebrate. Read on if you are ready for another great Wine Tasting from Boston Uncorked and purchase your tickets now. The last one sold out so this one should fill up fast.

The event will take place from 7:00 - 9:00 PM at Forum (formerly Vox Populi) on Boylston Street in the Back Bay. As always, the the food and wine will be flowing freely and will include some old and new favorites.  Members from my Red Sox Natives and Jim's Boston Wine Meetup groups will also be joining us along with a few others.

Tickets are $39.00 per person. There are no Maybe RSVPs since you must purchase a ticket in advance.

To purchase your ticket go to www.bostonuncorked.org.  http://bostonuncorked.org

 Please do not call or contact the Forum.

If you have never attended one of Boston Uncorked events, please check out their web site with photographs and history of past events.

We suggest you arrive early at 6:45 P.M. to meet and take advantage of the entire evening. Take public transportation if possible.

See you there.

 

Frank and the Red Sox Natives.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at 6:45 P.M. in the foyer at the bar on the first floor or 7:00 P.M. inside during the event.
item.name: Boston Uncorked 7th Anniversary Wine Tasting Party at Forum in the Back Bay
